## selectProp variable

An rxjs operator used to select a specified property from state and only emit when its value changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectProp: <TState, TResult>(prop: Extract<keyof Immutable<TState>, string>) => (source: Observable<Immutable<TState>>) => Observable<Immutable<TResult>>
```
